name: 陳秀慧
objective:
教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制,準確度等。內容有紅、可見、紫外、X光 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如 、液體層析等。
This text will introduce the fundamental principles and Applications of modern Analytical instruments.Measuring devices, limitations of measurements in terms of sensitivity and accuracy will also be taught. The contents are infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-ray and nuclear magnetic spectroscopes, Analysis of sur-faces with electron beams and mass spectrometry, thermal methods and chromatography and related separation methods.
schedule:
1. Introduction (實體上課請務必到校確認)

2.Electrical Components and circuits / Operational Amplifiers in Chemical Instrumentation  (遠端上課)

3.Digital Electronics and Computers / Signals and Noise (遠端上課)

4.An Introduction to Spectrometric Methods (遠端上課)

5 .Components of Optical Instruments / An Introduction to Optical Atomic Sepectrometry (遠端上課)

6. Atomic Absorption and Atomic Fluorescence Spectrometry / Atomic Emission Spectrometry (遠端上課)

7. Atomic Emission Spectrometry (遠端上課)

8. Atomic Mass Spectrometry / Atomic X-ray Spectrometry (遠端上課)

9.  Mid-Exam (實體教室測驗，考前一週會公布教室)

10. An Introduction to Ultraviolet-Visible Molecular Absorption Spectrometry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

11.Applications of Ultraviolet-Visible Molecular Absorption Spectrometry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

12 Molecular Luminescence Spectrometry / An introduction to Infrared Spectrometry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

13. Applications of Infrared Spectrometry  / Raman Spectrometry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

14.  Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy / Molecular Mass Spectrometry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

15.  An Introduction to Electroanalytical Chemistry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

16. Potentiometry / Coulometry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

17. Voltmmetry (依CDC公告彈性調整上課方式)

18.Final Exam (實體教室測驗，考前一週會公布教室)
